scripts.build:css: npm run compile-scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs app/scripts/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs app/scripts/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.imagemin: imagemin app/gfx dist/gfx -p && imagemin app/media dist/media -p
scripts.build:images: npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell 'npm run browser-sync:serve' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js'
scripts.build:all: metalsmith && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy_html && npm run copy_vendor_scripts
scripts.start: npm run build:all && npm run watch:all
